events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the engineering department based on the software engineering keywords found.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to proceed with the next stages of the hiring process for engineering roles.
The initial screening call was completed; the candidate demonstrated strong software development skills and relevant experience.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for the software engineer role on May 7th at 10 AM.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent problem-solving and coding skills.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
HR interview completed; the candidate was very professional and aligned well with company values and role requirements.
An official offer for the software engineer position has been sent to the candidate including details about salary and benefits.
The candidate has provided positive feedback and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and confirmed the start date for onboarding next month.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has begun successfully with the orientation and setup phases.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
